q_and_a.question: What is the Launch on Warning policy?
q_and_a.answer: The Launch on Warning policy is a policy where the US will launch nuclear weapons in response to a perceived nuclear attack before the attack actually happens.

q_and_a.answer: The Sole Presidential Authority is a concept where the President of the United States has the sole authority to launch nuclear weapons without needing to consult with anyone else.
